description.name: User can use app to add new references

given.name: app runs and command add is selected

scenario.name: user can add a book even if they leave a necessary field empty at first

given.name: app runs and command add is selected

when.name: a necessary field is left empty at first but then books information is given correctly

scenario.name: when adding a book, app asks all the right questions

given.name: app runs and command add is selected

then.name: all the right questions are asked

scenario.name: when adding an article, app asks all the right questions

given.name: app runs and command add is selected

then.name: all the right questions are asked

description.name: User can edit and delete references

given.name: app runs and command edit a reference is selected

then.name: the reference is changed and saved

scenario.name: user can not edit a reference that does not exist

given.name: app runs and command edit a reference is selected
app runs and command delete a reference is selected

scenario.name: user can not delete a reference that doe not exist

given.name: app runs and command delete a reference is selected

description.name: User can read already created references

then.name: references are printed in a readable form for humans
